definition: the liquid in which vegetables or meat have be cooked
details:
noun
- the liquid in which vegetables or meat have be cooked
= synonyms: pot liquor, pot likker
- an alcoholic beverage that is distilled rather than fermented
= synonyms: spirits, booze, hard drink, hard liquor, strong drink
- a liquid substance that is a solution (or emulsion or suspension) used or obtained in an industrial process
= example: a liquid substance that is a solution (or emulsion or suspension) used or obtained in an industrial process
